mapper.sql: A ."id" AS "id", A ."username" AS "username", A ."sex" AS "sex", A ."birthday" AS "birthday", A ."age" AS "age", A ."card" AS "card", A ."homeaddress" AS "homeaddress", A ."linkphone" AS "linkphone", A ."bitedate" AS "bitedate", A ."bitepart" AS "bitepart", A ."biteType" AS "bitetype", A."animal" AS "animal", A ."dealdate" AS "dealdate", A ."dealaddress" AS "dealaddress", A ."exposebefore" AS "exposebefore", A ."exposeafter" AS "exposeafter", A ."exposelevel" AS "exposelevel", A ."vaccinatename" AS "vaccinatename", A ."standard" AS "standard", A ."manufacturer" AS "manufacturer", A ."batchnum" AS "batchnum", A ."isinoculate" AS "isinoculate", A ."weight" AS "weight", A ."dosage" AS "dosage", A."create_date" AS "createDate", A ."create_by" AS "createBy.id", a.province AS "province", a.city AS"city", a.county AS "county", a.address AS "address", a.expose AS "expose", A."standard_no" AS "standardNo", A ."manufacturer_no" AS "manufacturerNo", A."batchnum_no" AS "batchnumNo", A."vaccinatename_no" AS "vaccinatenameNo", A ."remarks" AS "remarks", A."judgment_times" AS "judgmentTimes", A."payment" AS "payment", A ."history" AS "history", A ."openid" AS "openid", A ."tempid" AS "tempid", A ."dosage_no" AS "dosageNo", A ."rabiescode" AS "rabiescode", A ."s_id" AS "sId"
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM bs_rabies_checkin a
WHERE a."id" = #{id} AND a."deflag" = '0'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bs_rabies_checkin( "id", "username", "card", "sex", "birthday", "age", "homeaddress", "linkphone", "bitedate", "bitepart", "biteType", "animal", "dealdate", "dealaddress", "exposebefore", "exposeafter", "exposelevel", "vaccinatename", "standard", "manufacturer", "batchnum", "isinoculate", "weight", "dosage", "create_date", "create_by", province, city, county, address, expose, "standard_no", "manufacturer_no", "batchnum_no", "vaccinatename_no", "remarks", "judgment_times", "payment", "history", "openid", "tempid", "dosage_no", "rabiescode", localcode ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{username}, #{card}, #{sex}, #{birthday}, #{age}, #{homeaddress}, #{linkphone}, #{bitedate}, #{bitepart}, #{bitetype}, #{animal}, #{dealdate}, #{dealaddress}, #{exposebefore}, #{exposeafter}, #{exposelevel}, #{vaccinatename}, #{standard}, #{manufacturer}, #{batchnum}, #{isinoculate}, #{weight}, #{dosage}, sysdate, #{createBy.id}, #{province}, #{city}, #{county}, #{address}, #{expose}, #{standardNo}, #{manufacturerNo}, #{batchnumNo}, #{vaccinatenameNo}, #{remarks}, #{judgmentTimes}, #{payment}, #{history}, #{openid}, #{tempid}, #{dosageNo}, #{rabiescode}, #{localCode} )
mapper.update: UPDATE bs_rabies_checkin SET "username" = #{username}, "card" = #{card}, "sex" = #{sex}, "birthday" = #{birthday}, "age" = #{age}, "homeaddress" = #{homeaddress}, "linkphone" = #{linkphone}, "bitedate" = #{bitedate}, "bitepart" = #{bitepart}, "biteType" = #{bitetype}, "animal" = #{animal}, "dealdate" = #{dealdate}, "dealaddress" = #{dealaddress}, "exposebefore"= #{exposebefore}, "exposeafter" = #{exposeafter}, "exposelevel"= #{exposelevel}, "vaccinatename"= #{vaccinatename}, "standard"= #{standard}, "manufacturer" = #{manufacturer}, "batchnum" = #{batchnum}, "isinoculate" = #{isinoculate}, "weight" = #{weight}, "dosage" = #{dosage}, province = #{province}, city = #{city}, county = #{county}, address = #{address}, expose = #{expose}, "standard_no" = #{standardNo}, "manufacturer_no" = #{manufacturerNo}, "batchnum_no" = #{batchnumNo}, "vaccinatename_no" = #{vaccinatenameNo}, "dosage_no" = #{dosageNo}, "remarks" = #{remarks}, "judgment_times" = #{judgmentTimes}, "payment" = #{payment}, "history" = #{history} WHERE "id" = #{id} and localcode = #{localCode}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM BS_RABIES_NUM n WHERE n."checkid" = #{id} AND n."deflag" = '0' and n.localcode = #{localCode} ORDER BY n."vaccinum"
SELECT "NAME" FROM BS_MANAGE_VACCINE WHERE "ID" = #{vname}

SELECT DISTINCT V."ID", V."NAME" FROM VIEW_BS_PRODUCT P LEFT JOIN BS_MANAGE_VACCINE v ON v."ID" = P .VACCINEID WHERE (P.VACCINEID LIKE '28' || '%' OR P.VACCINEID LIKE '44' || '%') AND P.ISSHOW = 'Y' AND P.DEL_FLAG = '0' and P.localcode = #{localCode} and P.officecode = #{officeCode}
SELECT ID FROM BS_MANAGE_VACCINE A WHERE A.G_NUM = '44'
SELECT NVL ( LPAD ( MAX (SUBSTR(T ."rabiescode", 16, 4)) + 1, 4, 0 ), '0001' ) AS max_code FROM BS_RABIES_CHECKIN T WHERE SUBSTR (T."rabiescode", 12, 4) =#{year} and t.localcode = #{localCode}
SELECT "COUNT"(*) FROM BS_RABIES_CHECKIN A WHERE a."rabiescode" = #{rabiescode} and a.localcode = #{localCode}

SELECT n."id" AS "id", n."checkid" AS "checkid", n."vaccinum" AS "vaccinum", n."vaccidate" AS "vaccidate", n."realdate" AS "realdate", n."dose" AS "dose", n."paystatus" AS "paystatus", n.status AS "status", n."vaccineid" AS "vaccineid", n."manufacturer" AS "manufacturer", n."batchnum" AS "batchnum", n."nstatus" AS "nstatus", n."wstatus" AS "wstatus", n."create_name" AS "createByName", n."create_by" AS "createBy.id", n."create_date" AS "createDate", n."signature" AS "signature", s."signature" AS "signatureData", n."s_id" AS "sId", s."stype" AS "stype", n."pid" AS "pid" FROM BS_RABIES_NUM n LEFT JOIN BS_RABIES_SIGNATURE s ON n."s_id" = s."id" WHERE n."checkid" = #{id} AND n."vaccinum" = '0' AND n."deflag" = '0' AND n.localcode = #{localCode} ORDER BY n."vaccinum"

SELECT n."id" AS "id", n."checkid" AS "checkid", n."vaccinum" AS "vaccinum", n."vaccidate" AS "vaccidate", n."realdate" AS "realdate", n."dose" AS "dose", n."paystatus" AS "paystatus", n.status AS "status", n."vaccineid" AS "vaccineid", n."manufacturer" AS "manufacturer", n."batchnum" AS "batchnum", n."nstatus" AS "nstatus", n."wstatus" AS "wstatus", n."create_name" AS "createByName", n."create_by" AS "createBy.id", n."create_date" AS "createDate", n."signature" AS "signature", s."signature" AS "signatureData", n."s_id" AS "sId", s."stype" AS "stype", n."pid" AS "pid" FROM BS_RABIES_NUM n LEFT JOIN BS_RABIES_SIGNATURE s ON n."s_id" = s."id" WHERE n."checkid" = #{id} AND n."vaccinum" != '0' AND n."deflag" = '0' AND n.localcode = #{localCode} ORDER BY n."vaccinum"

SELECT V."ID" AS vaccinateid, V."NAME" AS vaccinatename, P .MANUFACTURER AS manufacturer, P .BATCHNO AS batchnum, S."LABEL" AS "standard", P .STORENUM AS storenum FROM VIEW_BS_PRODUCT P LEFT JOIN BS_MANAGE_VACCINE v ON v."ID" = P .VACCINEID LEFT JOIN SYS_DICT s ON s."VALUE" = P."SPECIFICATION" AND s."TYPE" = 'specification' WHERE (P .VACCINEID LIKE '28' || '%' OR P .VACCINEID LIKE '44' || '%') AND P .ISSHOW = 'Y' AND P .DEL_FLAG = '0' AND P .STORENUM >= '0' and p.localcode = #{localCode} and P.officecode = #{officeCode} ORDER BY V."NAME"

SELECT P ."vaccineid" AS vaccinateid, P ."batchnum" AS batchnum, P ."dose" AS "standard", "COUNT" ("batchnum") AS storenum1 FROM BS_RABIES_NUM P WHERE P ."paystatus" = '0' AND P .status = '0' AND P ."wstatus" = '0' AND P ."deflag" = '0' and p.localcode = #{localCode} GROUP BY P ."vaccineid", P ."batchnum", P ."dose"

SELECT P ."vaccineid" AS vaccinateid, P ."batchnum" AS batchnum, P ."dose" AS "standard", "COUNT" ("batchnum") AS storenum2 FROM BS_RABIES_NUM P WHERE P ."paystatus" = '1' AND P .status = '0' AND P ."wstatus" = '0' AND P ."deflag" = '0' and p.localcode = #{localCode} GROUP BY P ."vaccineid", P ."batchnum", P ."dose"

SELECT P ."vaccineid" AS vaccinateid, P ."batchnum" AS batchnum, P ."dose" AS "standard", "COUNT" ("batchnum") AS storenum3 FROM BS_RABIES_NUM P WHERE P .status = '1' AND P ."wstatus" = '0' AND P ."deflag" = '0' and p.localcode = #{localCode} GROUP BY P ."vaccineid", P ."batchnum", P ."dose"

SELECT s."signature" AS "signatureData", s."stype" AS "stype", b."id" AS "sId" FROM BS_RABIES_CHECKIN n LEFT JOIN BS_RABIES_SIGNATURE s ON n."s_id" = s."id" LEFT JOIN BS_RABIES_NUM b ON b."s_id" = s."id" WHERE n."id" = #{id} AND n."deflag" = '0' AND n.localcode = #{localCode} AND rownum = 1
mapper.delete: delete from bs_rabies_pay WHERE CREATE_DATE < SYSDATE-7
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM bs_rabies_checkin_bubble WHERE "TYPE" = #{type} AND ROWNUM < 11 ORDER BY "CREATE_DATE" ASC
SELECT * FROM bs_rabies_checkin_bubble
